definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">item_crafted</field><next><block type="controls_repeat_ext"><value name="TIMES"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1000</field></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_has_achievement"><field name="achievement">CUSTOM:Shinyadv</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="return_logic"></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="101" w="350">This example will test for two condtions. If the entity is a player and if the entity is wearing any armor. The armor condition is looking if the player is wearing any armor with an armor value greater than one. If the conditions are both true, then it will give the player an achivement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_armor_value"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_entity_compare"><field name="entity">EntityPlayer</field><value name="compareTo"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_add_achievement"><field name="achievement">CUSTOM:Shinyadv</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
